patthana8.59:1.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.59:2.1: Nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.59:3.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca nanadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.59:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
